definitions.definition: Not efficient ; not producing the effect intended or desired; inefficacious
Incapable of, or indisposed to, effective action ; habitually slack or unproductive ; effecting little or nothing
examples: Jessica was terribly inefficient at cleaning, so her brother usually had to clean the whole room.

main_definition: Not efficient ; not producing the effect intended or desired; inefficacious
secondary_definitions: Incapable of, or indisposed to, effective action ; habitually slack or unproductive ; effecting little or nothing
